Posted By: Julie Vognar
Everything on my 19th century page that you might want will be in the REA auction (descriptions of backs of cards available; I no longer have them in my possession). Give a look!

www.julievognar.com/home 

I will post the few things that are being returned to me (and are not in Mark Macrae's show, Nov. 26). I think they will call and tell me what these are to be, but they might just arrive in a package.
